author: Isaac Z. Schlueter <i@izs.me> (http://blog.izs.me/)
name: couch-login
description: A module for doing logged-in requests to a couchdb server

scripts.test:clean: rm -f test/fixtures/_users.couch; rm -f test/fixtures/pid; rm -rf test/fixtures/.delete; rm -f test/fixtures/couch.log;  rm -f test/fixtures/couchdb.uri; exit 0;
